title: I've started a Patreon Page
description: A number of you have asked me to start a page so you could support these videos. I'm humbled and overwhelmed by such generosity. So here is the link to the page if you wish to support me making these videos. https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

transcript_parts.text: hi this is Paul and almost since the
beginning when I started this project a
number of people have asked how they
could support me making my videos there
are of course some expenses in terms of
equipment and and it clearly takes time
to make and some of this I do at church
and I see it as part of my ministry some
of this I do as a hobby and it's kind of
outside my ministry I've debated
starting at patreon I listen to Jordan
Peterson when you know his rationale for
starting his and I thought that sounded
good give away the stuff for free don't
I don't monetize my videos on on YouTube
and those of you who like what I'm doing
and want to support this can can now
through patreon support me I would I
have some ideas of some other things I'd
like to continue to do I'd like to do
some question-and-answer things and so
patreon might be a good venue for some
of that what I would I what I'm trying
to figure out how not to do is is to
really have a pay-for-play
type operation part of that is because
of my ministry outlook and yeah I don't
want I don't want money getting in the
way of good conversation the difficulty
is obviously that the bigger the channel
grows the more difficult it is to have
conversations with people so I've
started a patreon account and those of
you who'd like to support me can support
me I'm working with the Deacons of the
church to start Online Giving for
Livingstone's
a number of you have sent in checks to
the church and I appreciate that the
church appreciates that it's you know
the church has been very supportive of
these videos so far and I can do nothing
but praise this church for the kind of
freedom and support that they've given
me and the kinds of ministries that have
done over the last 20 years we we
continue to host our meetups here at
church and the people out living stones
are lovely wonderful people so this is
the announcement I'll put the link down
in the notes and the link is up on the
YouTube page if you'd like to support
this work you can support me via patreon
and when we get church Online Giving set
up I'll put a link there too so thanks
for watching and thanks for your support
